distri: Looking at the number of songs we can state that the analysis of Metal songs properties can be done from the middle of 80's. It is very interesting to observe that Metal music of 90's is still almost as much listened(hottness) as the newer songs.
Hottness: Accoustiness of metal songs has always been lower than the average songs. Indeed metal music is famous for the amazing Electric guitar rifts. Instrumentalness seems to have a bit changed over the years to finally reach the same amount has average music.
